name: 陳晏笙
objective: 中文內容概述: 本課程為進階電磁解析，注重數學理論與公式推導，包含波導的模態分析、由天線電流分布解出輻射場型、時間簡諧電磁場、大型陣列場型分析及最佳化。
schedule:
Week 1: Exam
Week 2: Waveguides with cylindrical conducting boundaries
Week 3: Waveguides with cylindrical conducting boundaries
Week 4: Special waveguide types
Week 5: Special waveguide types
Week 6: Resonant cavities
Week 7: Resonant cavities
Week 8: Resonant cavities
Week 9: Exam
Week 10: Radiation
Week 11: Radiation
Week 12: Radiation
Week 13: Special topics
Week 14: Special topics
Week 15: Special topics
Week 16: Presentation
Week 17: Presentation
Week 18: Exam
scorePolicy:
1. 期初考 15% (Transmission lines and plane wave propagation，請同學利用寒假準備)
2. 期中考 15%
3. 期末考 25%
4. 作業 2% * 10 = 20%
5. 期末報告及發表（英文八千字或中文兩萬字以上）25%
materials:
1. Harrington, Roger F. Time-harmonic electromagnetic fields. McGraw-Hill, 2001.
2. Ramo, Simon, John R. Whinnery, and Theodore Van Duzer. Fields and waves in communication electronics. John Wiley & Sons, 2008.
3. Smith, Glenn S. An introduction to classical electromagnetic radiation. Cambridge University Press, 1997.
